articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: Lies of P is a new Bloodborne-inspired take on Pinocchio for PC, PS5, Xbox - Polygon
articles.description: Round 8 Studio and NeoWiz announced a soulslike RPG called Lies of P and it’s based on the children’s story Pinocchio. The game is slated to come to Google Stadia, PlayStation 5, Windows PC, Xbox Series X, and xCloud in 2023.
articles.content: I dont remember Pinocchio being this scary

articles.title: You can get a PS5 at GameStop right now - The Verge
articles.description: GameStop has released PS5 stock in the form of bundles for the disc-based and disc-less console, starting at $599.99. It’s not the cheapest way to get a PS5, but hey, it’s a way to get a PS5, which has been incredibly tough.
articles.content:

articles.title: Nintendo’s new Zelda amiibo adds new fast-travel to Skyward Sword HD - Polygon
articles.description: Nintendo’s Zelda & Loftwing amiibo gives Link new fast-travel options in The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD. Out July 16, the $24.99 amiibo launches the same day as the Nintendo Switch remaster.
articles.content: Zelda & Loftwing lets Link head to the skies at any point in the game

articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: The Last of Us Part II gets long-awaited 60fps update for PS5 - The Verge
articles.description: The Last of Us Part II is getting a long-awaited PS5 patch on Wednesday that lets you play the game at a targeted 60fps frame rate. Once you’ve installed the patch, you can choose between a targeted 30 or 60fps.
